recommendations: Sayanima Kisku â€œSatya is a hardworking and meritorious student who has won coveted bursaries and scholarships for his academic achievement. Along with academics, his involvement in sports and societies like SPE makes him an all rounder. He continues to navigate through obstacles with the determination to create a niche for himself in the Indian energy industry. As a mentor I really appreciate his sincerity in every assignment he takes up. I wish him the best for his future endeavours.â€
